description: ASCENT is an open source platform for simulating peripheral nerve stimulation. To download the software, visit the [ASCENT GitHub repository](https://github.com/wmglab-duke/ascent). This implementation uses a limited set of user-defined parameters to run the pipeline and will output the results of the NEURON simulations * Musselman ED, Cariello JE, Grill WM, Pelot NA. ASCENT (Automated Simulations to Characterize Electrical Nerve Thresholds): A Pipeline for Sample-Specific Computational Modeling of Electrical Stimulation of Peripheral Nerves. PLoS Comput Biol [Internet]. 2021; Available from: https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1009285 * Musselman ED, Cariello JE, Grill WM, Pelot NA. ASCENT (Automated Simulations to Characterize Electrical Nerve Thresholds): A Pipeline for Sample-Specific Computational Modeling of Electrical Stimulation of Peripheral Nerves. PLoS Comput Biol [Internet]. 2021, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.5500260

input_1.label: Nerve Morphology
input_1.description: Choice of Vagus nerve morphology - either Rat VN or Human VN

input_2.label: Cuff geometry
input_2.description: 45° contact wrap monopolar cuff or 360° contact wrap monopolar cuff or 45° contact wrap, bipolar cuff or 360° contact wrap, bipolar cuff

input_3.label: Fiber Locations
input_3.description: centroid: one fiber location at the centroid of each fascicle wheel: 6 spokes with 2 fibers per spoke, plus the centroid; 13 fiber locations per fascicle

fibers.label: List of Fiber Diameters
fibers.description: Comma-separated list of fiber diameters (between 2 and 10), defaults units are μm. At least one value must be provided, maximum 5 values

input_4.label: Waveform
input_4.description: monophasic: pulse (cathodic for  monopolar  cuff;  cathodic phase  first  on  contact  closest to  recording  site  for bipolar cuff) biphasic: symmetric biphasic pulse

durations.label: List of Waveform Durations
durations.description: Comma-separated list of pulse widths (between 0.05 and 2), default units are ms. At least one value must be provided, maximum 5 values.

name: ascent-runner

output_2.label: Environment Variables
output_2.description: Sample number, model number and simulation number for postprocessing.
